soumGuaranteeMoneyBackGuarantee: 100% money-back guarantee in case of discrepancy
paymentsSecured: We ensure all payments are totally secured
specificationsMatch: We guarantee the product matches the specifications
moneyBackGuarantee: Full 1-year warranty with free returns within 10 days
returnExplanation: We offer you a free warranty on any product sealed with a 10-day guarantee.
returnDetails: Changed your mind? return the device for any reason to Soum for free for the first 10 days. Contact <important>customer service</important> to return the device, and we'll transfer the money to your account
warrantyDetails: Warranty for any defects for the first year.
